summary: A collection of helper utilities for generating, reading, and writing NeMo ASR data manifests and related files (segment manifests, RTTM, CTM). The functions handle audio file metadata extraction, subsegment creation, speaker label mapping, and formatting of manifest entries for training and evaluation pipelines.
business_intent: Enable streamlined preparation and manipulation of speech recognition datasets, including speaker diarization information, by automating manifest creation and conversion between common annotation formats.
